channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- SHIELD TV
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- SHIELD TV

item.title: CVE-2021-1068|2024-08-03T15:55:18.501Z -- nvidia -- shield%20tv
item.description: NVIDIA SHIELD TV, all versions prior to 8.2.2, contains a vulnerability in the NVDEC component, in which an attacker can read from or write to a memory location that is outside the intended boundary of the buffer, which may lead to denial of service or escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2021-1067|2024-08-03T15:55:18.573Z -- nvidia -- shield%20tv
item.description: NVIDIA SHIELD TV, all versions prior to 8.2.2, contains a vulnerability in the implementation of the RPMB command status, in which an attacker can write to the Write Protect Configuration Block, which may lead to denial of service or escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2021-1069|2024-08-03T15:55:18.496Z -- nvidia -- shield%20tv
item.description: NVIDIA SHIELD TV, all versions prior to 8.2.2, contains a vulnerability in the NVHost function, which may lead to abnormal reboot due to a null pointer reference, causing data loss.
